item.description:
April happens to coincide with Newport Restaurant Week !

http://www.discovernewportrestaurantweek.org/restaurants

We'll visit Brick Alley Pub for lunch and we'll be ordering off the special restaurant week menu.

Here's their website:

These are their offerings for restaurant week (lunch menu): $16.00 plus tax and gratuity and any drinks

http://www.discovernewportrestaurantweek.org/listings/restaurants/documents/menus/originals/bapnptrestaurantweek-7.pdf

We will ONLY be ordering from the restaurant week menu - not the regular menu.

Hope to see you there
item.how_to_find_us: At entrance, will email cell day before

group.name: Rhode Island Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Lunch: Brick Alley Pub- Restaurant Week
